plot: Two clueless best friends find their lives in peril when they are forced into stealing a teddy bear from the 9-year-old daughter of a crazed crime-lord.
title: Stealing Roscoe Brown
plot_es: Two clueless best friends find their lives in peril when they are forced into stealing a teddy bear from the 9-year-old daughter of a crazed crime-lord.
plot_en: Two clueless best friends find their lives in peril when they are forced into stealing a teddy bear from the 9-year-old daughter of a crazed crime-lord.
